Topic.Title: Powerhouses Apple (AAPL) And International Business Machines (IBM) To Merge In Mid 2013 Ventures Sierra World Equity Review

Message.Msg: Nah -- IBM has decided to put earphones on the Z. It will store a googolplex of songs or a centillion of Youtube. Their too big for Best Buy though -- look for them at Costco.

Topic.Title: Obama: The Dark Side of Special Dividends

Message.Msg: "Blah,blah,blah.....taxes on the rich have never been lower,so deal with it. Trickle down is a failed concept, and the divide between the rich and the poor has never been wider. The rich with a conscience are fine with, and our country has prospered undwr a tax baae FAR higher than what is being proposed." But spending was a lot lower. And folks living in South Dakota didn't have to bail out Detroit and Chicago because they can't collect enough in taxes locally to pay local bills -- not a bailout for a disaster like a hurricane -- Chicago hasn't made a contribution to the Chicago Teachers Pension Fund in years -- has about $10 bil and shrinking by about $500 mil a year -- teachers contribute very little -- the Mayor says RE tax in Chicago would have to double just to save that one fund. What has clearly failed is promising other peoples money that doesn't exist. Social Security and Medicare will have to be means tested or Treasury paper will become junk. So yes -- taxes have to go way up and benefits way down blah,blah, blah.

Message.Title: Breaking below bottom support
Message.Msg: Not looking good? Or, Buying opportunity? What would Warren B do? We know the answer - hold and maybe buy more - long term looks good as short termers get shaken. I offer a toast to the steady and resolute!
Warren might be selling but will know it a month from now

Topic.Title: Obama: The Dark Side of Special Dividends

Message.Msg: ... every time a society has punished success, punished investment capital, and punished the wealthy the way Obama is doing while expanding the welfare state... ... it has ALWAYS resulted in reducing the standard of living of EVERY member of society in the decades that followed. Always. There are no exceptions. Even Germany, with it's extensive social welfare system, doesn't punish investment capital and it's deployment anywhere NEAR what Obama Proposes. S

Topic.Title: Obama: The Dark Side of Special Dividends

Message.Msg: Still on your rag huh? Taxes are NOT punishment for success. It's what you pay to live in your country. I could go on about what you get for it - but I won't, that is a waste of breath on you. Why don't you go find one with no taxes and (hopefully) no internet access?

Topic.Title: IBM getting out of hardware buisness then co will break up into software / serivces

Message.Msg: Actually the opposite is happening. Two or three companies will be selling the entire stack from hardware to application software and everything in between including services.

Message.Title: Wow ... The new leaders are lost
Message.Msg: A changing of the guard has transpired .... The new leaders have encountered a bad quarter and are frantic ... It's their first as "LEADERS" " looking for Lou and Dot to deliver them as they send useless "desktop publishing" email and "Win" mail .... Clueless and will drive the business into the toilet ... The 401k approach is there first line of defense. Who are these people on the org chart ..... Usually you know or have heard of them you have an opinion good or bad .... These folks wow - who are they !
